New Records: England advanced to the Euro 2024 semifinals for the second straight UEFA European championship
Key Match Events: Bukayo Saka scored the equalizer in the 80th minute
Neither squad was able to break through in extra time
Jordan Pickford made a stop in the opening round of penalty kicks
England and Switzerland converted on the penalty kicks in the following three rounds to give the Three Lions a 4-3 edge
Pre-Game Insights: Gareth Southgate disagreed with the sentiment that England drew an easier path to the final than the other favorites at Euro 2024
Gareth Southgate said that's a classic example of entitlement we have as a nation that creates drama and annoys our opponents
Post-Match Reflections: England manager Gareth Southgate praised his team's resilience after coming back from 1-0 down
Jordan Pickford made a crucial stop in the opening round of penalty kicks to give England the edge they needed to advance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match went to a penalty kick shootout after a scoreless 30 minutes of extra time
England will take on the winner of Saturday's Netherlands-Turkey match on Wednesday
